subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Brandon Webb pitched his third consecutive shutout and extended his scoreless streak to 42 innings, tossing a two-hitter last night to lead the Arizona Diamondbacks past the host Atlanta Braves, 4-0.
snippet: Brandon Webb pitched his third consecutive shutout and extended his scoreless streak to 42 innings, tossing a two-hitter last night to lead the Arizona Diamondbacks past the host Atlanta Braves, 4-0.
